Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Electrocute \E*lec"tro*cute`\, v. t. [Electro- + cute in execute.] To execute or put to death by electricity. -- {E*lec`tro*cu"tion}, n. [1913 Webster]

electrocute v 1: kill by electric shock; "She dropped the hair dryer into the bathtub and was instantly electrocuted" 2: kill by electrocution, as in the electric chair; "The serial killer was electrocuted" [syn: {fry}]
